selected_quotes: Delivering on promise of universal health coverage: call for papers

.@HarvardGH The BMJ to launch an initiative on universal health coverage #globalhealth

news.title: Harvard: Obamacare program isn't working
news.summary: A key Obamacare program intended to revolutionize the U.S. healthcare system by tying hospital compensation to medical outcomes is not working, according to a new study from researchers at Harvard University.
